/* LoginStatusMapper.selectLoginStatus */
SELECT tms.HQ_OFFICE_CD, tho.HQ_OFFICE_NM, tmpll.STORE_CD, tms.STORE_NM, tmpll.POS_NO, tmpll.HW_AUTH_KEY, tmpll.LOGIN_IP, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(tmpll.LOGIN_DT ,'YYYYMMDDhh24miss'), 'YYYY/MM/DD hh24:mi:ss') AS LOGIN_DT, tmpll.POS_VER_NO, tms.SYS_STAT_FG, (SELECT NMCODE_NM FROM TB_CM_NMCODE WHERE NMCODE_GRP_CD = '005' AND NMCODE_CD = tms.SYS_STAT_FG) AS SYS_STAT_FG_NM, tmpll.LOGIN_SEQ
FROM TB_MS_POS_LOGIN_LOG tmpll, TB_MS_STORE tms, TB_HQ_OFFICE tho WHERE tms.STORE_CD (+)= tmpll.STORE_CD AND tms.HQ_OFFICE_CD = tho.HQ_OFFICE_CD
AND (tms.AGENCY_CD = #{agencyCd})
AND tmpll.LOGIN_DATE BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} --조회(영업)일자
AND tho.HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd} --본사코드
AND tho.HQ_OFFICE_NM = #{hqOfficeNm} --본사명
AND tms.STORE_CD = #{storeCd} --매장코드
AND tms.STORE_NM = #{storeNm}
AND tms.SYS_STAT_FG = #{sysStatFg} --매장상태
ORDER BY LOGIN_DT DESC, STORE_CD, POS_NO
